scenarios.title: Scenario 1 – Cooperative intergovernmental AI labour success
highlights: Three validators revealed in lockstep, clearing payment without governance escalation.
Employer-confirmed burn proof executed before settlement, protecting the protocol treasury.
Agent graduation minted a credential NFT immediately upon finalization.

scenarios.title: Scenario 2 – Cross-border dispute resolved by owner governance
highlights: Validators split votes; a non-revealing validator triggered automatic penalty logic.
Agent exercised dispute rights and prevailed through multi-signature governance.
Owner and delegated moderator executed signature-based resolution without halting the market.

scoreboard.label: Jobs orchestrated
scoreboard.explanation: Production contracts executed full job lifecycles on Hardhat.

scoreboard.label: Value settled
scoreboard.explanation: Agent and validator rewards transferred through escrow + fee mechanics.

scoreboard.label: Owner commands executed
scoreboard.explanation: Configuration, pause, and dispute instructions issued during the drill.

scoreboard.label: Certificates minted
scoreboard.explanation: Credential NFTs minted for agents that completed work.

scoreboard.label: Disputes resolved
scoreboard.explanation: Jobs escalated to governance and settled via signed resolutions.

scoreboard.label: Validator accountability events
scoreboard.explanation: Validators with penalties or withheld reveals during the simulation.

highlights.title: Owner mission control
highlights.body: Fees, validator incentives, and emergency pausers were tuned live, delegated, and restored without downtime.

highlights.title: Agent prosperity
highlights.body: 380.0 AGIα delivered to AI agents alongside certificate credentials.

highlights.title: Validator discipline
highlights.body: Validators met quorum without penalties in this run.

highlights.title: Governance resilience
highlights.body: 1 dispute scenario(s) resolved via owner + moderator signatures, proving unstoppable arbitration.

ownerConfidence.summary: Owner sovereignty rehearsed end-to-end. Emergency drills, parameter tuning, and restoration all completed successfully.
checks: Owner drill: every core module paused and resumed under direct control.
Delegated moderator drill succeeded, proving emergency delegation works.
Baseline parameters restored to their pre-drill configuration.
Owner reclaimed pauser roles across registry, stake, and validation modules.

quickStart: Run `npm run demo:agi-labor-market:dashboard` to execute the Hardhat simulation and launch the dashboard.
Open the printed http://localhost:4173 URL to explore the sovereign control room.
Use the Owner Command Snapshot to rehearse configuration changes before pushing to mainnet.
